column1: The Purple Pig////(+++) Pork spare ribs with BBQ sauce + farro ($18): Omg this is possibly the most meticulously fine-tuned ribs I've ever had. The meat is so tender it appears to fall off the bone spontaneously
column2: and the flavors are robust with prominent smokey tones
column3: with hints of bacon and ham. I thought the thick overlaying sauce would be overwhelming
column4: but the mix of BBQ sauce and creamy yogurt-like drizzle added dimensions of familiarity and novelty. Not sure if I could go back to plain old BBQ ribs now.
